website_summaries.verdict: An ab belt that will help you lose weight quickly without breaking your budget.
pros: Includes latex-free neoprene construction that delivers superior heat insulation and stomach coverage
Easy-to-use belt wraps around the stomach and retains heat in the abdominal area
Supports the abdominal and lower back muscles to help improve posture
cons: Thin belt tends to bend and roll to one side of the back

customer_reviews.title: Multi functional/great for my low back pressure
customer_reviews.text: I love wearing this waist belt for cardio. It helps me sweat a lot more than I normally would which I love because it sheds more water. I have someone of an anterior pelvic tilt in my lower pack which can cause pressure there and I've noticed this helps support my lower back especially when I'm squatting and deadlifting. I like that the belt itself is pretty discrete and isn't too noticeable when wearing it. I though it would start smelling from the sweat but the material is easily cleaned just by wiping after use.
customer_reviews.author: BryCal

customer_reviews.title: Helps Support The Back Also
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior who is experiencing some back pain. I bought this belt because it looked like what I needed to help support my back rather than trim my waist which would be an added bonus if it did that. What I have noticed is, that it does create heat when worn next to the skin or over a t shirt.. It has helped support my back given its wide surface and excellent Velcro gripping power.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fair price.
customer_reviews.text: This really works man got me sweating. I use it with my boxing training so it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Be sure of what you want and get it
customer_reviews.text: I like the Fitru waist trimmer belt. I have been using it the past week. It does make me sweat too. It depends on how much a person sweat if the individual would need to wear a small shirt under the Fitru belt, so it does not irritate their skin. I like it because it's thick and hold in place great. I would say if you have a short body structure that it might be hard to wear. I am 5'8' so if someone was under 5'0' feet might need a shorter waist trimmer belt by width. I knew what I was ordering and it fit me the way I wanted it too. Thanks great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging it came in had no holes or rips. The material is really good quality material. When you wrap it around you are easily able to make it fit your stomach whether your bigger or smaller. It's actually comfy. I could seriously wear this around all day. haha. You can wear the belt under your shirt and you can't even tell its there, at least for me. I am a size small so maybe that's why it worked really well for me. I fell like this trimmer really does make me lose weight. I love it! I highly recommend getting this item!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i use it every day and i am starting to see results.
customer_reviews.author: courtney hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Seriously makes you sweat.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. This is the second Fitness band type thing that I’ve purchased and this definitely is higher quality and makes me sweat more than my previous one. The size measurements are accurate. I thought it might run small so I ordered a bit bigger than what I needed and it’s a bit big. Not the fault of the product though. It’s still possible for me to use it by just tightening it a bit more. I’m not crazy about the fact that I can’t just throw it in the wash and wash it, it’s supposed to be wiped clean and hand washed. Otherwise it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It is everything and more. The quality for the price is outstanding. Way better than what you can buy at the local sporting goods store. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Shore

customer_reviews.title: Good product....
customer_reviews.text: I think it works great, research says differently. They find that these types of wrsps restrict muscle growth etc....It definitely makes you sweat more and I really felt like my waist line after a.couple hours felt tighter.....maybe a state of mind but who cares , made me feel better. Make sure you clean thoroughly after each use though, stays wet for a while..... Would like it a little thinner so you do not see it as much under clothes, little bulky up front. But hey its the gym , who cares, some of these Yoga pants shouldnt be worn either......
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Paturzo

customer_reviews.title: "This waist trainer will not disappoint"
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely awesome. As a big man who's working hard to shed some pounds this waist trimmer has been a tremendous help in shedding excess water and it feels/fits extremely well. Highly recommended .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its just average at best -  and over priced at worst...
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting top of the line quality product - wrong again. Its made okay - just not made to do the job its advertised to accomplish. Little on flimsy side - not thick material that will stand a better chance of holding up over time with non living room (T.V.) usage - if you get my drift. It fits okay - Velcro works fine - just doesn't give you the robust feeling for almost $25 price you might expect. I would not recommend on price alone - there are better for less. Another lesson learned - in some cases you don't always get what you pay for. Nice transaction - quick ship - well packaged: a plus for the item.
customer_reviews.author: Inquiring Minds

customer_reviews.title: I wear this to the gym to work out and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear this to the gym to work out and play racquetball. I even wear it when mowing my grass. Let's face it guys, once we get older it get's harder to lose that belly fat. This belt will help.
customer_reviews.author: Verified shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Waist Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is my second Fitru Waist Trimmer without any complaints so this must be a good item. One main difference between other Waist Trimmers that I have tried is that this one does not roll up from the bottom when you bend or sit which is a good thing. It stays in place and it seems to do it's job. Only time will tell if it makes a difference on my waistline but my part in eating a good diet will impact that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory W. Irish

customer_reviews.title: Quality Ab Belt
customer_reviews.text: I wear this ab belt when I exercise and for support when I am sitting at my desk all day. I exercise at least 4 days per week. Previous belts that I have purchased have begun to rip at the seams in a very short amount of time. Very upsetting!. This belt has held up for over a month now with no signs of tears or ripping. It appears to be a thicker and better made belt than other belts that I have purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Buccaneer Booty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Waist Trimmer!! Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This waist trimmer works very well! Wide band provides great support and covers more of your core. Really gets the sweat rolling. Has strong seams and the Velcro has held up great. I don't have any pain, so I can't testify to it's effectiveness on pain relief. Using this trimmer has aided me in losing 4" of my waist in only 8 weeks.Overall, very pleased with this waist trimmer. I would purchase again and will when it wears out or I need a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Abernethy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I wear this Waist Trainer Stomach Wrap when working out. After working out my stomach was sweating. I think it did some progress.I also have bad back posture and when laying down doing the weights with arms. I fell it defiantly helped my back to not curl but let me lay flat. I love this product. Best choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Thank you from a big guy!
customer_reviews.text: So I have gain quite the weight and unfortunately I need support for my back and core. Fitru was the only waist belt that fit my gut, 63" and it fit perfect. It has helped me work out more often and dont have to worry about my back hurting. Its hard to lose weight but thank you Fitru for making products for us big fellows and giving us a chance to lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: I like this waist trimmer compared to several others that I ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this waist trimmer compared to several others that I have had before because it does give more support than the others I have had. So far it has stood up to my use I wear it at least 4 days a week at about 3 hours at a time in the gym and it is holding up I purchased the wide version but I still think it could be about an inch or two wider, I have an extra long torso they should have one for people with a longer upper body like me.
customer_reviews.author: Sensei Torres CKF

customer_reviews.title: Nice wrap
customer_reviews.text: I use this to warm sore, stiff back muscles that accompany lumbar disc issues. Really warms me up (I wrap outside an undershirt) and wear it below my main shirt when my back needs some soothing. This Velcro really grips. It also supports somewhat, too, but not like a real back brace, though. Good quality wrap. Size large is good for my 34 inch waist.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Feel the Burn!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and fits perfect. I used this yesterday for the first time during one of my crossfit wods and it was very comfortable and discrete. I noticed right away that it was working because my lower back and stomach felt like it was on fire from the heat(in a good way)! I definitely recommend this product to anyone looking to shed some extra water weight in the midsection, or for some extra support during a workout.
customer_reviews.author: K Cams Corner

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking! This is what you need!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness. I have ordered a couple different belts like this but I just got off the treadmill after 40 minutes and immediately wrote this review! Stop looking THIS IS THE ONLY BELT YOU NEED! I cannot believe the sweat that came off of it and I'm still dripping!!
customer_reviews.author: crimegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be well made and is easy to learn how to use. Caveat to all the buyers out there though, the belt has a very strong rubber smell right out of the package. Made my house small awful for a day. Cleaning with a damp cloth as the instructions say did not help. I ended up soaking the thing and scrubbing with soap, then leaving out to dry with Baking soda on and around it to absorb the smell. Even with all that work, it took about two and a half days for the smell to finally go away. I enjoy the product now, but it was very challenging to get it usable.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Sweat Belt Functionality and Size
customer_reviews.text: It fits right. I may be able to hit a few golf balls as long as I secure it with my stretchy baseball belt. It was the first review of a young girl posting a video that made me take a chance. It might help your customers to know that the large version (9x42) will fit a 40 inch waist. I took a guess. It might even work for a 42 inch waist because it stretches and there is a fair amount of velcro
customer_reviews.author: T. G.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Firm and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! I'm 300 lbs 5'8 waist area is around 46 inches. It's wide enough and is soaked after about 2 miles on the treadmill. I got in black and pink! 😍 Very well constructed. Not like the flimsy ones most vendors sale!!
customer_reviews.author: AM I Am

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I've used other belts like this before. I received it a few weeks ago and use it for my 45 minute cardio sessions daily. Because several of the reviews suggested their belt was too small, I ordered one size up. Realistically, there is absolutely no harm in ordering one size up. In my case, the belt just wraps around my waste a little further. Very comfortable fit. Very effective as measured by the depth of sweat puddles underneath my cardio equipment after each workout.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: I Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My first waist trainer that fits perfecto. I love it!!! I wear it every time I workout and hopefully I will see some changes with my waist line along with my healthier habits!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Practice makes perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with the product. My main purpose is to burn some extra calories around the abdomen area, but I only purchased recently so I am yet to see some results although plenty of sweating IS happening. Is the product perfect? Well, I have one small issue with it. It seems it is well-designed nevertheless it does create a tiny bit of friction where one flap meets the other. I guess it’s a matter of using the Velcro properly, but it does require precision placing. Nothing major, no reason to give it a bad rating and plan on continuing to use it regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Juan H Diez

customer_reviews.title: Great product with price!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this waist trimmer and they were definitely fulfilled! The band itself is made with some good material nothing like the flimsy one I had initially bought at Ross that lasted me about two weeks before it fell apart. I like the Velcro part of the strap that can attach to the belt. I tried it on and it’s comfortable and gives support! Great product so far will update when I workout with it!
customer_reviews.author: vero

customer_reviews.title: So Far sooooo Good! :-)
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 1x and the belt fits well, I have no complaints!!! A great sweat maker!!! I wear my belt at work all day and its only been 3 days and I see and feel a difference in my stomach!!! Get this BELT ladies and gents!!! Go buy!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for every workout
customer_reviews.text: this gets worn 7 days a week through cardio and lifting. just the right amount of support to ensure I keep proper posture during workouts, and noticeable difference in my waist as it definitely keeps the sweat going
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product works as expected and fits comfortably
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it was to put on the Waist Trimmer Weight Loss Ab Belt and how comfortable it felt to wear. I use the weight loss ab belt when I am working out or when I am playing with my VR headset and it definitely works. Each time I use it, I create a lot of sweat. I just wish is was easier to clean. I use a wash cloth to clean the belt and wipe off all the sweat, but this is not always an easy task. Other than the cleaning issue, I am really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Maher

customer_reviews.title: The Fitru Waist Trimmer Weight Loss Ab Belt for Women & Men - Waist Trainer Stomach Wrap is Great
customer_reviews.text: The Fitru Waist Trimmer Weight Loss Ab Belt for Women & Men - Waist Trainer Stomach Wrap is too small for me at this point... Will need larger size....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great waist trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a WIDE waist trimmer. I think this is about 9-10 inches wide. I love the fact it doesn't roll up on you while wearing. It also has two Velcro pieces on the end so it hold very nicely. I can wear it under my shirts and no one notices.
customer_reviews.author: Ra2215

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. I was a little worried because reviews said it breaks apart really fast. I wear it longer than I should, and have had it for about 3 weeks now. It’s holding up and working. For the price, I’d repurchase. Some people have remakes about the new smell. It is strong in the beginning, but, at least you know it’s not used :)
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size and Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: This product works perfect! Does exactly the job I need it to do which is make me sweat! It's a perfect size I have a size 33 waist and got the 9x34, it stretches well so it overlaps slightly and is low profile which was exactly what i was looking for. My only small thing i have against it is when you stretch it out the velcro gets bunched up because the width of the band gets slightly smaller.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelGallo

customer_reviews.title: Works so far
customer_reviews.text: This thing has velcro that is pretty strong, I broke a nail trying to remove it in a hurry once. I can feel the sweat from this even just sitting around, not much ventilation but I can definitely feel it working.
customer_reviews.author: @Firecrackerkaylyn2-IG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal x2
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I used it once after getting it and I seriously have to say its amazing and works well!!!! Off to buy a smaller one for my wife. I just recieved my 2nd one, had to order a small pink one for my wife. Love these products
customer_reviews.author: david suess

customer_reviews.title: easy on and off.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as support by itself or with other products. Good support and works up a sweat faster when walking or doing light work and or exercising. I wear it sometimes when I sleep to help support my stomach. Since I I am a side sleeper using this elevates some of the back pain I have in the morning. I do find it comfortable to wear this to work, having it on for up to 12 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that works great!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable/durable/easy to use. My biggest pro with this product is that is stays nice and secure during my cardio workouts. The design is smooth and sleek with no bulges visible from the outside (shirt over waist trainer). Lastly, best of all it works great! I love getting a nice sweat going when I’m working out. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great waist trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked my waist trimmer. It's a lot tighter than my previous belt and I could see the belly fat sweat on the belt.
customer_reviews.author: Big Rob

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Helps with my sciatica pain, I also use it when I take my morning walk. It produces a great amount of sweat which I feel helps with my weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: LeGene  Lett

customer_reviews.title: Makes me look thinner
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable gives me a little back support trims my abs and helps me lose wieght. It compresses my abdomin so I do not eat as much and am not hungry.
customer_reviews.author: Don S.

customer_reviews.title: You may be allergic to the material
customer_reviews.text: The belt did help me with my lower back pain, it's well designed, and easy to put on. However, I developed a terrific mid-section rash. I haven't been able to determine whether I am allergic to the material or not. It would be interesting to know if anyone else has had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: rolandot

customer_reviews.title: Fitru Waist Trainer Works
customer_reviews.text: I just received the waist Trainer and it is too soon to rate its effectiveness. It wraps around my waist fine. I use the trainer for support and I hope it will help reduce my waist. Keeping my waist trim is primarily a functionofmy diet and how hard I work on my core at the gym I only]y use the Fitru Waist Trimmer when I am on my stationary cycle at home. I use the waist trainer flour times a week when I do my aerobics on a stationary bike. It appears to be fine, but as I mentioned earlier, it is too soon to know how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Man!

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to aerobic work
customer_reviews.text: It is the best of this type of product. Often it is thought to be a weight loss belt but that is not really accurate. It does provide support ad the added worth while exercising seems to reduce the risk of injury. Good to walk with if that is your exercise, or stationary bike, but not so much street bike. It am satisfied the with product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: JUNK- Would Not Recommend - DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Does not last very long. The belt held its form for the first few uses then began falling apart quickly. Would not recommend. Update- STILL DO NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: The Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It provides great lumbar support and really gets the sweat going in my middle section. I would highly recommend this product and the cost is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: was looking for something to simply sweat in my belly area, as its harder to lose weight there, and this was perfect. its inexpensive compared to other ones yet very effective. I has some what support if you want to deadlift or squat, I don't use it for heavy lifting.sizing is very accurate however id recommend to get a size up so it wraps around twice and makes you sweat more.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony ramos

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes and it’s great for toning up my midsection which was my primary focus
customer_reviews.author: pat d

customer_reviews.title: Sweating the spare tire away
customer_reviews.text: love to take it off and see all that sweat makes me feel so much better about my workouts. My daughter on the other hand (who is a skinny minny) just loves to see all the sweat :)
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE BOYER

customer_reviews.title: Size as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and gives good support. I really like the way the velcro attaches in two places instead of just the strip. I would give it a 5 for helping pain but I have a terrible back. Time will tell how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: both bands work excellent for my teenagers
customer_reviews.text: I got 2, both bands work excellent for my teenagers. they use it all the time. fits perfect on them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara JL Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Waist Trimmer Belt
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this belt for two years. Still the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Webb

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: Love this waist trimmer! Fits perfect and does not feel bulky like others I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Fit as described and quality was great!! Will be ordering one for my daughter. Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it because of construction materials used. Great price excellent size. Nice colors
customer_reviews.author: Harry Wolfgang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit light weight
customer_reviews.text: I fit great and I’m using it for heat concentration on that hard to get rid of area around the stomach .
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is the first wrap I have use that has really made me sweat. I love the inner material it really helps you build up a sweat and it doesn’t slip. The velcro is super strong once its on you don't have to worry about it coming undone.
customer_reviews.author: tarapsb7

customer_reviews.title: Time to sweat...
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to find waist trimmers in xs. It fits perfect! Will work to keep core tight during exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.ME

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a very good product for the price. Love the wide fit and length,which provides great waist coverage. My only issue is it seems to not generate as much sweat as other cheaper made waist trimmer belts I've had in the past. However, since I love the fit and it also provides great back support, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best band out there
customer_reviews.text: I've had many waist bands and this one is by far the best I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Was larger that I expected but is good rugged material.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size 8"x42". I have a 36" waist. It was too big (long). I carefully cut off 10 inches for a proper fit. I should have got the 34" size since you have to pull it tight. It is very rugged material.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Mom loves it, for back support and calories to be burned. Also keeps you warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Like the great fit and stays firm. gave me the sweaty workout that I wanted and expected.
customer_reviews.author: EJM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: And has great back support as well why you are doing activities burning those calories
customer_reviews.author: Joel Grogan

customer_reviews.title: GET RIPPED...as in ripped I mean the product.
customer_reviews.text: As you can see the product is hardly used. Wore this on occasions mostly when doing cardio. Unfortunately the dang thing ripped where the neoprene connects to the vertical Velcro attachment. I hope if you read this that you DO NOT spend your hard earned money on this waist trimmer. If anything use that money for another months gym membership! To all, May the shreds be with you! GO SLAY!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Matsuda

customer_reviews.title: Finally,  a device that works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Fitru Waist Trimmer is a wonderful back support device for me.
customer_reviews.author: CARLTON LEMONS

customer_reviews.title: How to use it properly.
customer_reviews.text: I like this item. It works well. I’ve recommended it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Hinds

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: this wrap heats up and should burn off some excess belly weight. very good during workouts. some support when lifting weights. good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Quality back support for bigger people.
customer_reviews.text: Great service and fast shipping. Product exactly as advertised. Extremely satisfied all-around with this quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kage

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when expected. Works well and is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: HLC51

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: helps creates more burn in the abdomen area when working the core. Increases the temp and gets you sweating. Very comfortable. Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Calsol

customer_reviews.title: Top Belt for Bigger Stomachs
customer_reviews.text: This is the only belt that wraps around my stomach. A great quality belt as well. I highly recommend purchasing if you are well girthed in the stomach area.
customer_reviews.author: King George

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted !
customer_reviews.text: Its simple and effective. Not too bulky and somewhat comfortable. Love it
customer_reviews.author: MiCo

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that this belt is wide, narrower belts tend to curl. Was surprised it worked so very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Novak

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised, yay!
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as described and totally fits my 6'4, 380lb husband perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: SingelGirl

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love how much I sweat in my mid section when I'm wearing it during my workouts. I'm trying to get rid of this belly fat.
customer_reviews.author: Fott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I spent money on a zipper belt and it tore in just a couple of days. This belt snugs tight and sheds the water and fat away. I recommend this product to anyone who wants to shed pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Strong willed

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is made really well. High quality stuff. Great price. Fast shipping too. Thanks guys.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny J.

customer_reviews.title: large enough
customer_reviews.text: largest size fits a large full body waist area. Rolls a little if you short.
customer_reviews.author: churchie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fat dude. 5'8 255 lbs. Large fits fine for velcro, sticks good. Works well! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DerekZachBlakeDavid

customer_reviews.title: Mid section weight loss
customer_reviews.text: Great for cardio and matches most bodies for months of wait lose without needing to buy a new one for different sizing. Definitely I must own if you are looking to lose weight around mid section!
customer_reviews.author: Guy DeMers

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It makes me sweat a lot when I’m working out. Sometimes, I can feel sweat dripping down in my underwear and makes it wet.
customer_reviews.author: Manasuma Kamara

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wear, comfortable, and helps protect my back during exercise or working in my yard.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this product and their customer service. I initially ordered the wrong size and they sent me the correct size immediately. It is really so comfortable that I forget I even have it on. And when I remove it, I am sweating under it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it for maybe a couple of weeks now and I haven’t lost any weight but it sure does make you sweat around your stomach. The one thing I don’t like about it is that when I wrap it around my stomach the Velcro is wider than the other end so when I work out I can feel the velcro and it’s uncomfortable sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: It does help you sweat
customer_reviews.text: I like it but not sure how good it will be over time. It does help you sweat.. ill update my review on a long-term use.. I try too wear it during work hours but it tends too dig into my skin. Not sure if I'm wearing it right..
customer_reviews.author: FreakzRitual

customer_reviews.title: It covers your lower abs and it really helps to get sweaty.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered the other waist trimmer but this one is really different and high quality. Highly recommended. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT FIRST DAY
customer_reviews.text: I had a belly burner that lost its velcro, tried this and it is the best aid I have had in losing weight in a healthy way.
customer_reviews.author: PoppaRick

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He wears it at the gym while he's doing cardio then switches to a weight lifting belt for lifting
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Best one I have bought.... Very flexible and the strap keeps attached
customer_reviews.author: jeff church

customer_reviews.title: Run very large,  consider a size less than you need.
customer_reviews.text: The ends roll up when you move, limiting its effectiveness, if you have any kind of a chubb roll, it will roll this up and you will lose support. I think it is a little wimpy for what it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have started walking again since I bought this. I feel like I'm losing some weight.
customer_reviews.author: sam dvorak

customer_reviews.title: sweat like a pig under it
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable and does not roll over, sweat like a pig under it, so far so good. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: i got it at a great price
customer_reviews.text: i really do not have the answer i only used it twice from what i get from just using it twice i think it is going to work just by the way it make me feel
customer_reviews.author: rocky cooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Came ahead of schedule. Exstremely pleased I have ordered the arm bands as well. I will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S.Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with stubborn belly fat. I have been using it for 3 weeks - I love it. It’s great to see the sweat when you take it off!
customer_reviews.author: Jame

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product is great. I have use the waist trimmer for one ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is great. I have use the waist trimmer for one week during my daily workouts. I must say that you sweat a lot which is great, because I'm not a individual that sweats so I would love to if the waist trimmer will trim my waist. The only reason I gave a 4 star because I haven't used it enough to see results to rate it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: LaTanya Coleman

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like they way it is built! Not just a thin neoprene that deforms after several uses. This gives me good support and works great!
customer_reviews.author: SSgt B

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: High quality product - I have tried several other brands and they could not compare. The last one I had ripped during a workout but this one is much sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great belt. Great material. Better than anything else you can buy at a store. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Geo A

product_meta.title: Fitru Waist Trimmer Weight Loss Ab Belt for Women & Men - Waist Trainer Stomach Wrap
feature_bullets: HIGHEST QUALITY: Made with wide and thick latex-free neoprene of the best quality that is safe while ensuring superior heat insulation and stomach coverage, utilizing durable fabrics and a strong fastener that won’t come undone during exercise.

SUPERIOR CRAFTSMANSHIP: While other sweat belts fall apart at the seams after a few weeks of use, ours is designed and made to stand up to abuse, using the strictest quality control standards in the industry!

ENHANCED EXERCISE: Lose water weight and maximize calorie burn during exercise! This easy to use waist trimmer wraps around your stomach and retains heat in your abdominal area, increasing your core temperature while enhancing thermogenic activity and sweat.

ELITE TECHNOLOGY: Fitru Waist Trimmers utilize Anti-Slip Grid technology on the interior surface to prevent the sauna belt from slipping, bunching, and moving. This interior also repels moisture to prevent sweat build up while creating a contoured fit that conforms to your shape and size.

COMFORT, SUPPORT, PAIN RELIEF: Fitru waist trimmers are made from comfortable light-weight materials that will conform to you while supporting your abdominal and lower back/lumbar muscles improving your posture and creating a therapeutic heat that relieves minor pain.
